name: lazy-llm
author: LazyLLM Maintainer <cccc38753@gmail.com>
description: Multi-LLM desktop interface built with Electron, React, and TypeScript.

scripts.dev: bun run build:inject && bunx electron-forge start
scripts.build:inject: bunx esbuild src/inject/inject.ts --bundle --platform=browser --format=iife --target=es2020 --minify --outfile=dist-electron/inject.js && bunx esbuild src/inject/inject.ts --bundle --platform=browser --format=iife --target=es2020 --minify --outfile=.vite/build/inject.js
scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && bun run build:inject && bun run build:app
scripts.package: bun run build:inject && bunx electron-forge make
scripts.test:electron:smoke: bun run build:inject && bun run build:app && playwright test tests/electron/
